name: srtm_slope_500m
title: Ground Slope
description: Global slope (in degrees) derived from Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) dataset (v4.1) at 500m resolution.
details: Created using SRTM elevation data and generating slope in QGIS (which uses gdaldem tool)

extract_types_info.mean: average slope within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum slope within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum slope within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Jarvis A., H.I. Reuter, A. Nelson, E. Guevara, 2008, Hole-filled seamless SRTM data V4, International Centre for Tropical Agriculture (CIAT), available from http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org.
